document_data.name: Sun Soul Monastary
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sun Soul monastery''' of [[Tasseldale]] was one of the few active priories of the [[Order of the Sun Soul]] [[monk]]s during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was located in a re-purposed ruined freehold within the [[Dun Hills]]. The monks of this order, along with followers of [[Tyr]] from the [[Abbey of the Just Hammer]], contributed greatly to the pacification of monsters, particularly [[goblin]]s, in the region.
document_data.Recruitment: While the monks of this monastery freely opened their doors to prospective students of all nations and races, they were particularly uncompromising on those who hailed from [[Sembia]].
